modules.description: Handles decoding and identifying symbols from images, providing access to the encoded string data and symbology type. Works with symbol objects containing data and metadata from barcode or QR code scans. Used to extract specific symbol content and determine encoding formats like QRCode or EAN8 from scanned images.

Handles QR code and barcode scanning from images using the ZBar library. It provides configuration options for symbol types, caching behavior, and decoding parameters, and works with image and symbol data types to detect and return recognized symbols. Used to extract structured data like URLs, product codes, or tracking numbers from visual media.

Handles image data for QR code decoding by converting pixel formats and managing memory. Works with raw image buffers and fourcc format codes. Used to prepare video frames for ZBar symbol extraction by converting them to grayscale.

Handles video device configuration and frame capture for QR code decoding. It supports device initialization with size and interface preferences, opening/closing devices, and streaming raw images. Useful for capturing live video from a webcam and processing each frame to detect QR codes.

This module decodes QR codes and barcodes from images and video streams using the ZBar library. It provides functions to control verbosity, process raw image data into grayscale, scan for symbols, and capture video frames from devices. Concrete use cases include extracting URLs from still images, reading product codes from video feeds, and processing live webcam input to detect tracking numbers.
